name: Twitter Timeline
description: Automatically add a twitter timeline to any theme.

widgetId.label: Widget ID
widgetId.info: The widget ID is located in the url after you have created your widget from https://twitter.com/settings/widgets.

validation.error_message: Please enter a widget id. Click more info for where this can be found.

element.label: Element
element.info: Enter the selector of the element for where you would like your timeline to appear. If you leave this blank it simply be appended to the html body.

theme.label: Theme
theme.info: Specifies whether your theme is dark or light to setup the style properly.

width.label: Width
width.info: Enter the width you would like your timeline to be. If left blank it will default to the width of the element.

height.label: Height
height.info: Enter the height you would like your timeline to be. If left blank it will default to the height of the element.

linkColor.label: Link color
linkColor.info: The hex code that you would like the color of the links in your tweets to appear.

borderColor.label: Border color
borderColor.info: The hex code that you would like the color of the border for your timeline.

limit.label: Tweet limit
limit.info: The number of tweets you would like to appear in your timeline. The minimum amount is 1 and the maximum amount is 20.

noheader.label: No header
noheader.info: Removes the header from the timeline.

nofooter.label: No footer
nofooter.info: Removes the footer from the timeline.

noborders.label: No border
noborders.info: Removes all of the borders from the widget.

noscrollbar.label: No scrollbar
noscrollbar.info: Crops and hides the main timeline scrollbar, if visible.

transparent.label: Transparent
transparent.info: Removes the background color from the timeline.
